mapper.select: SELECT s.id FROM show_tb AS s LEFT JOIN review_tb AS r ON r.show_id = s.id LEFT JOIN category_tb AS sc ON s.show_type_id = sc.id LEFT JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON h.id = s.hole_id JOIN location_tb AS l ON l.id = h.location_id JOIN rent_place_reservation_tb as rp ON s.id = rp.show_id WHERE s.show_status = 1 AND rent_place_status = 1 GROUP BY s.title ORDER BY s.id DESC

SELECT s.id, s.title, round(avg(r.rating), 1) AS rating, s.content, sc.show_type, s.img_route, s.title, s.start_date, s.end_date, l.location FROM show_tb AS s LEFT JOIN review_tb AS r ON r.show_id = s.id LEFT JOIN category_tb AS sc ON s.show_type_id = sc.id LEFT JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON h.id = s.hole_id JOIN location_tb AS l ON l.id = h.location_id JOIN rent_place_reservation_tb as rp ON s.id = rp.show_id WHERE s.show_status = 1 AND rent_place_status = 1 GROUP BY s.title ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT #{begin}, #{range}

SELECT s.id, s.title, round(avg(r.rating), 1) AS rating, s.content, sc.show_type, s.img_route, s.title, s.start_date, s.end_date, l.location FROM show_tb AS s LEFT JOIN review_tb AS r ON r.show_id = s.id LEFT JOIN category_tb AS sc ON s.show_type_id = sc.id LEFT JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON h.id = s.hole_id JOIN location_tb AS l ON l.id = h.location_id JOIN rent_place_reservation_tb as rp ON s.id = rp.show_id WHERE s.show_status = 1 AND rent_place_status = 1 AND rating != 'NULL' GROUP BY s.title ORDER BY round(avg(r.rating), 1) DESC LIMIT #{begin}, #{range}

SELECT s.id, s.title, round(avg(r.rating), 1) AS rating, s.content, sc.show_type, s.img_route, s.title, s.start_date, s.end_date, l.location FROM show_tb AS s LEFT JOIN review_tb AS r ON r.show_id = s.id LEFT JOIN category_tb AS sc ON s.show_type_id = sc.id LEFT JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON h.id = s.hole_id JOIN location_tb AS l ON l.id = h.location_id JOIN rent_place_reservation_tb as rp ON s.id = rp.show_id WHERE s.show_status = 1 AND rent_place_status = 1 AND rating != 'NULL' GROUP BY s.title ORDER BY round(avg(r.rating), 1) ASC LIMIT #{begin}, #{range}

SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT s.id FROM show_tb AS s JOIN review_tb AS r ON r.show_id = s.id JOIN rent_place_reservation_tb as rp ON s.id = rp.show_id WHERE s.show_status = 1 AND rent_place_status = 1 AND rating != 'NULL' GROUP BY s.title) AS c

SELECT s.id, s.title, round(avg(r.rating), 1) AS rating, s.content, sc.show_type, s.img_route, s.title, s.start_date, s.end_date, l.location FROM show_tb AS s LEFT JOIN review_tb AS r ON r.show_id = s.id LEFT JOIN category_tb AS sc ON s.show_type_id = sc.id LEFT JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON h.id = s.hole_id JOIN location_tb AS l ON l.id = h.location_id JOIN rent_place_reservation_tb as rp ON s.id = rp.show_id WHERE s.show_status = 1 AND rent_place_status = 1 AND sc.show_type = #{category} GROUP BY s.title ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT #{begin}, #{range}
SELECT * FROM show_tb WHERE organizer_id = #{userId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT r.* FROM show_tb AS s JOIN review_tb AS r ON r.show_id = s.id WHERE s.id = #{showId};

SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT s.id FROM review_tb AS r RIGHT JOIN show_tb AS s ON r.show_id = s.id LEFT JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN category_tb AS sc ON s.show_type_id = sc.id JOIN rent_place_reservation_tb as rp ON s.id = rp.show_id WHERE rent_place_status = 1 AND sc.show_type = #{category} AND s.show_status = 1 GROUP BY s.title) AS c
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO show_tb(img_route, title, content, start_date, end_date, admission_age, adult_rate, youth_rate, organizer_id, show_type_id, hole_id) VALUES (#{imgRoute}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{admissionAge}, #{adultRate}, #{youthRate}, #{organizerId}, #{showTypeId}, #{holeId})
INSERT INTO show_datetime_tb(show_date, show_time, show_id, hole_id) VALUES (#{startDate}, #{startTime}, #{showId}, #{holeId})
mapper.select: SELECT *, sdt.id as show_datetime_id FROM show_tb AS s JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sdt ON s.id = sdt.show_id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON s.hole_id = h.id JOIN location_tb AS l ON l.id = h.location_id JOIN user_tb AS u ON u.id = s.organizer_id WHERE sdt.show_id = #{showId}

SELECT s.id, s.organizer_id AS user_id, s.title, s.content, s.admission_age, c.show_type, s.show_status FROM show_tb AS s JOIN category_tb AS c ON s.show_type_id = c.id ORDER BY s.show_status ASC, s.id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE show_tb SET show_status = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
